Description: Removes your ability to look back at information such as other last wills or chatlogs after they have already been presented to you, making the game a memory test.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Active In Ranked
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether you are cursed in Ranked mode

CheckboxSettings.Name: Active In Ranked Practice
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether you are cursed in Ranked Practice mode

CheckboxSettings.Name: Active In Classic
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether you are cursed in Classic mode

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Debugging
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether the mod's logs will be displayed (keep it off, only turn on if the dev tells you to)
